main event: A civilian reported observing one unidentified object in Salt Lake City on September 17, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed at night with a bright whitish glow,The object appeared to be 10-12 feet in diameter and gave no sound,The object moved silently and appeared to stand still at times,It disappeared suddenly behind trees,The sighting lasted for varied durations as per the observer's accounts.
sighted object: unidentified object with a bright whitish glow
